title: FontFont introduces a brand new license: App+
content:
_Berlin, Germany – Wednesday 24 July 2013:_ [FontFont](https:/www.fontfont.com) announced today a brand new [**App+ license.**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322013903/https:/www.fontfont.com/formats#app)

[
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322013903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontfont_appplus_5908.gif)
](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322013903/https:/www.fontfont.com/formats#app)

Comprehensive, affordable and available online, the new [App+ License](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322013903/https:/www.fontfont.com/formats#app) is ideal for apps, games, editable PDFs, and hardware.

With [App+](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322013903/https:/www.fontfont.com/formats#app), customers can now embed all FontFonts in software, hardware and editable documents that can be viewed, printed or edited.

Available [online](http://web.archive.org/web/20150322013903/https:/www.fontfont.com/formats#app) with pricing based on the number of years, there is now no need to buy a license for every app or device, one license will cover them all.
author: Ivo
